participant_abstract.sent: The final meeting was a success, the product was presented and evaluated highly.

My role was to give the criteria on which the product would be assesed and a team we decided on the results, which wererated on a scale of 1-7, 1 being if the product met the criteria set by me from the data given to me for the earlier meetings.
We concidered the product a success.

participant_actions.sent: All members will now finish all questionaires we have been given about today.

participant_decisions.sent: Decisions in the meeting were about the device's abilioty to meet criteria which it passed with flying colours.

participant_problems.sent: The only issue in the meeting was the fact that we had to cut corners on the product to meet the cost budget.
We would have rather had more expensive components to make the device better.
